violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD shall be safe, unADULTERATED and honestly presented. (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) In FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which cleaning methods other than water flushing are used for cleaning floors, the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and closed to no larger than one thirty-second inch.
(B) The floors in FOOD ESTABLISHMENTS in which water flush cleaning methods are used shall be provided with drains and be graded to drain, and the floor and wall junctures shall be coved and SEALED.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except otherwise approved, and except for antislip floor coverings or applications may be used for safety reasons, floors, floor coverings, walls, wall coverings, and ceilings shall be designed, constructed, and installed so they are SMOOTH and EASILY CLEANABLE.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not constructed, designed, installed according to law
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Remove and replace to be in compliance with law.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be cleaned as often as necessary to keep them clean.
(B) Except spill cleanup, cleaning shall be done during periods when the least amount of FOOD is exposed such as after closing.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD EMPLOYEES shall wear hair restraints such as hats, hair coverings or nets, beard restraints, and clothing that covers body hair, that are designed and worn to effectively keep their hair from contacting exposed FOOD; clean EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, and LINENS; or unwrapped SINGLE-SERVICE or SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Except otherwise approved, and except for antislip floor coverings or applications may be used for safety reasons, floors, floor coverings, walls, wall coverings, and ceilings shall be designed, constructed, and installed so they are SMOOTH and EASILY CLEANABLE.
violationsByInspectionidList.problemDescription: Not constructed, designed, installed to be
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Repair/replace to be smooth and easily cleanable.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PHYSICAL FACILITIES shall be maintained in good repair.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Church's Fried Chicken #785
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: PACKAGED FOOD may not be stored in direct contact with ice or water,  except as allowed by LAW.
